Logging.OldConfigConverted: Old config file format converted successfully.
Logging.PlayerGivenBooks: Player %s was given %s books when joining the server.

Error.OldFormatConversion: Error converting to new config file format.

Update.Available: New version available! See http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/bookrules/ for more information.

Notification.GivenAllBooks: %s has given you all registered books.
Notification.NoTrading: You may not trade BookRules books with villagers.

Success.GetAll: You have received a copy of all registered books.
Success.GetOne: You have received a copy of the requested book.
Success.GiveAll: You have given %s all registered books.
Success.GiveOne: You have given %s a copy of the requested book.
Success.Add: Your book has been added successfully.
Success.Delete: The requested book has been deleted.
Success.ChangedAuthor: The author has been successfully changed.
Success.ChangedTitle: The title has been successfully changed.
Success.Unsigned: The book has been successfully unsigned.

Info.CommandsHeader: All BookRules commands you are able to use:
Info.Reload: Reload data from the config files.
Info.Get: Get book specified by id or title, or all books if no id or title is specified.
Info.Give: Give a player the book specified by id or title, or all books if no id or title is specified.
Info.Add: Add the currently held book to the plugin.
Info.Delete: Delete the book specified by id or title from the plugin.
Info.List: Show all of the books currently stored by the plugin.
Info.Author: Change the author of the currently held book.
Info.Title: Change the title of the currently held book.
Info.Unsign: Unsign the currently held book, changing it back to a book and quill.

Error.PlayerOnly: This command may only be executed by a player.
Error.NoPerms: You do not have permission to use this command.
Error.BookNotFound: The requested book could not be found.
Error.NoPlayerSpecified: You must specify a player to give books to.
Error.PlayerNotFound: The requested player could not be found.
Error.MustHoldBook: You may only perform this command while holding a written book.
Error.NoBookSpecified: You must specify a book to delete.
Error.NoAuthorSpecified: You must specify an author when setting the author of a book.
Error.NoTitleSpecified: You must specify a title when setting the title of a book.
